scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pieces included: 1 CD, 1 submission letter. Notes: CD includes a recording of Out of the depths and Fragments by the same composer. The submission letter also includes information about Out of the depths and Fragments. Scores for these pieces are housed seperately. Note on envelope: GJ2.1 .04, GJ2.2 .07, GJ2.3 .99.
